briefdescription.para: Instantiates a new Adafruit_LSM303 class.

parameterdescription.para: an optional identifier for the sensor instance

briefdescription.para: Sets up the hardware and initializes I2C.

parameterdescription.para: The I2C address to be used.
The Wire object to be used for I2C connections.

simplesect.para: True if initialization was successful, otherwise false.

briefdescription.para: Gets the most recent sensor event, Adafruit Unified Sensor format.

detaileddescription.para: Gets the most recent sensor event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an Adafruit Unified sensor_event_t object that we'll fill in

briefdescription.para: Gets the sensor_t data.
Sets the accelerometer's range.

parameterdescription.para: an lsm303_accel_range_t representing the range of measurements in +/-G. The smaller the range, the more accurate.

briefdescription.para: Gets the accelerometer's range.

simplesect.para: The lsm303_accel_range_t representing the range of measurements in +/-G.

briefdescription.para: Get the accelerometer's power mode.

simplesect.para: The lsm303_accel_mode_t representing the power mode.

briefdescription.para: Sets the accelerometer's power mode.

parameterdescription.para: an lsm303_accel_mode_t representing the power mode. The mode effects the precision of the sensor's readings High resolution is 12-bit Normal mode is 10-bit Low power is 8-bit

briefdescription.para: Sets the polarity of the interrupt pins.

parameterdescription.para: Set to true for the INT pints to be active high, false for active low

briefdescription.para: Get the latest sensor event.

simplesect.para: True if able to fetch an event

briefdescription.para: Get info about the sensor itself.
Setups the HW.
Get the latest sensor event.

simplesect.para: True if able to fetch an event

briefdescription.para: Get info about the sensor itself.
Gets the Least Significant Bit value for the current mode.

parameterdescription.para: the current mode, used to determind the appropriate lsb value in concert with the current range setting.

briefdescription.para: Gets the bit shift amount for the current mode.

parameterdescription.para: the current mode, used to determind the appropriate shift amount based on the bitdepth of the mode

briefdescription.para: Reads the raw data from the sensor.
Abstract away platform differences in Arduino wire library.
Abstract away platform differences in Arduino wire library.
Reads the raw data from the sensor.
Unified sensor driver for the accelerometer.
